title: Hardware Essentials
description: Explore key computer hardware components and their roles in tech.

quiz.question: What is the role of the CPU in a computer?
Which hardware component is crucial for multitasking?
What does the BIOS manage in a computer system?
Which component is known as the 'brain of the computer'?
What type of storage is known for faster data retrieval?
Which component acts as the central hub connecting all hardware?
What is the role of cache memory?
What does CMOS stand for and what is its function?
options: Centralized Memory Output System; manages memory
Complementary Metal-Oxide Semiconductor; stores BIOS settings
Central Monitoring Operating System; oversees CPU performance
Component Management Output System; manages all hardware components
quiz._answer: Complementary Metal-Oxide Semiconductor; stores BIOS settings

quiz.question: Which role benefits from understanding CPU capabilities for optimizing applications?
Why is hardware knowledge crucial for tech professionals?
options: It aids in troubleshooting and optimizing system performance
quiz._answer: It aids in troubleshooting and optimizing system performance
